title: NASA's Curiosity Rover Faces Its Toughest Climb Yet on Mars
summary: Shortly before the rover’s 11th anniversary on the Red Planet, its team helped guide it up a steep, slippery slope to examine meteor craters.

title: Northrop Grumman Announces Cygnus Spacecraft Upgrades
summary: Northrop Grumman is planning significant upgrades to its Cygnus cargo vehicle, geared towards supporting both the International Space Station (ISS) and future commercial space stations.

title: Psyche One Step Closer To Launch, Solar Arrays Installed
summary: NASA's Psyche spacecraft achieved a crucial milestone as its jumbo solar arrays were methodically tested and permanently installed on the orbiter inside a pristine clean room near the Kennedy Space Center in Florida.

title: Investing in Space: Rocket Lab stock leads the sector in year-to-date gains
summary: At the beginning of this year, I included a breakout space stock as one of the three things I’m watching for in 2023. Just past the halfway point we have strong contenders for that title, led by Rocket Lab and followed by Redwire and Mynaric, with the top five rounded out by Telesat and BlackSky.

title: Northrop Grumman planning Cygnus upgrades
summary: Northrop Grumman is planning upgrades to its Cygnus cargo vehicle, such as increased payload capacity, to support both the International Space Station and future commercial space stations.
